text:
S$20 Nett for eat all you can mookata Buffet. Lok Lok S$1(nett) per stick.
,.
My favorite have to be their meat, both pork and chicken. I tried their Garlic pork collar, Sesame pork collar, Garlic chicken and Spicy chicken. They do not have beef which I don‚Äôt eat too. I especially love their pork collar as it is not too fatty, tender and delectable. For mookata lover like me, this is a must go to eat üòã at a pocket friendly buffet (eat all you can) price of S$20 nett. They do not use msg in their food and soup. üëç I tossed the mama instant noodles with their two in house made chilli sauces, it is tasty üòã
,.
For drink, I tried their signature Thai milk tea. S$3.50. They use brown sugar, it is not sweet and pretty nice. üòãüëç.

Review posted on my Ig: Yummymich

Great food, great atmosphere, very accessible next to outram Park mrt!
Behind the shop there is a open air carpark but always full. Next place to park is dorsett.

Food is fresh, must try must order is Uncle Beng Minced Meat!

Food are freshly prepare and served.

There is Loklok to, price is reasonable!

Friendly owner.

Oh ya, their in house mix chilli Is great too.
Do note their operating hour
1700hrs till 1030

Do call and reserve seats before coming too.
Call this number to reserve your table 98787169.

Solid place with the friendliest boss. Very affordable loklok (my personal favourite is the juicy mushroom loklok) and good variety, fresh mookata ingredients good portion, tried the 2 pax and 4-5 pax sets. Don't forget their wonderful signature sauce. Nice cosy place to hangout too.

Great mookata experience! The dipping sauce is one of the best I‚Äôve ever had.

Affordable pricing with comfortable environment. Should drop by when you are at Chinatown area.

$20 per pax buffet, very value for money we did an ala-carte order of dessert -
waffles is very light & fluffy. Very warm & friendly service.
